thread.title: ‘The Grinder’ Review: A Lawyer to Love
thread.title_full: ‘The Grinder’ Review: A Lawyer to Love - WSJ

author: Nancy deWolf Smith
title: ‘The Grinder’ Review: A Lawyer to Love
text:
Imagine if Sam Waterston, after playing a prosecutor for years on “Law & Order,” had gone on to have a second career in the law, using the strategies and legal mumbo-jumbo he absorbed on various episodes of the show. That is the amusing gist of “The Grinder,” except that in place of Mr. Waterston, this Fox comedy stars Rob Lowe as an actor fresh off years of playing a legal eagle on a now-cancelled drama.
When Dean Sanderson (Mr. Lowe) arrives back in his hometown of Boise, Idaho, he is a major celebrity, still...
